*div1 type="summary"* *p*Sylvester Murphy to Austin, June 12, 1831. Arrived from Georgia in February with 50 slaves. Wants land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-12-1831">12th June 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir*/p*
*p*I take the liberty of droping you a line by *person_mentioned*Mr. Wm Austin*/person_mentioned* my health being very delicate prevents me from addressing you personally. I arrived here from *location_mentioned*Georgia */location_mentioned*the *date_mentioned n="02-xx-1831">latter part of February */date_mentioned*with fifty odd *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned*, but understanding you were absent from *location_mentioned*St Phillipe*/location_mentioned*, I have not yet applied for any *location_mentioned*Land*/location_mentioned*, I have been respectably informed your disposition has been, to encourage those, that bring into your *location_mentioned*Collony */location_mentioned*a large disposible force. I will feel grateful to you to select and reserve for me *location_mentioned*one of the most valuable Leagues*/location_mentioned* you have to dispose of. Common report says, that *person_mentioned*Doctor Phelps*/person_mentioned* has forfeited his *location_mentioned*League*/location_mentioned*, should that be the facts, I beg of you (if in your power) to give it to me, but should the Government alone have the disposal of it, you will oblige me by useing your influence in my favor. I am now living at the *location_mentioned*Gin Place*/location_mentioned*, and that *location_mentioned*tract of land*/location_mentioned* would suit me better than *person_mentioned*any other person*/person_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*Collony*/location_mentioned*. I have agreed with *person_mentioned*Mr John Austin*/person_mentioned* to open and fence *location_mentioned*one Hundred acres there*/location_mentioned*, and I could improve both places at the same time, and if *person_mentioned*Dr Phelps*/person_mentioned* has forfeited, I think I deserve the land more than *person_mentioned*any other man*/person_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*Collony*/location_mentioned*, for I have the force to cultivate a large portion of it. I refer you to *person_mentioned*John and William Austin*/person_mentioned*, a reply is respectfully asked for.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sylvester Murphy */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
